required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multicenter Prospective Post-registration Study of Empegfilgrastim to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy in Special Cancer Populations
clinical_study.official_title: Defendor Special: A Multicenter Prospective Observational Post-registration Study of Combined Chemotherapy With Empegfilrastim Support to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy in Patients With High and "Gray Zone" Risk Reccurrence Breast Cancer, Gastointestinal Cancers and Gynecological Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This study was designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Extimia® (INN - empegfilgrastim) in reducing the frequency, duration of neutropenia, the incidence of febrile neutropenia and infections caused by febrile neutropenia in patients with High and "Gray Zone" Risk Reccurrence Breast Cancer, Gastointestinal Cancers and Gynecological Malignancies

primary_outcome.measure: Relative dose-intensity (RDI) of the myelosupressive therapy course

secondary_outcome.measure: RDI of 6 x TC, 6 x TCHP, ddAC x4 -> 4 x paclitaxel , dd4AC -> 4 x paclitaxel + 12 x carboplatin) regimens performed in relation to (neo) adjuvant therapy of breast cancer
RDI of FOLFOX-, FOLFOXIRI-based regimens performed in relation to (neo) adjuvant therapy of colorectal cancer
RDI of FOLFOX-, FOLFOXIRI-based regimens performed in relation to patients with potentially resectable liver metastases of colorectal cancer
RDI of DCF-, FOLFORINOX-based regimens performed in relation to therapy of pancreatic cancer
RDI of DCF-, FOLFORINOX-, FLOT-, FOLFOX-based regimens performed in relation to therapy of gastric and esophageal cancers
RDI of chemotherapy courses performed in patients with cervical cancer and sarcoma of the uterus after irradiation of the pelvic organs
The complete pathological responses (pCR) rate in the primary tumors for patients diagnosed with HER2 + and triple negative early breast cancer requiring neoadjuvant treatment
The complete pathological responses (pCR) rate in the malignant lymph nodes for patients diagnosed with HER2 + and triple negative early breast cancer requiring neoadjuvant treatment
The incidence of febrile neutropenia with empegfilgrastim supportive therapy compared with historical control

The incidence of neutropenia leading to a dose reduction of cytostatic drugs and / or an increase of the interval between cycles when using empegfilgrastim supportive therapy compared with historical controls
Completed cases number of (neo) adjuvant therapy
Frequency of study withdrawal due to adverse events
RCB rate in patients with breast cancer

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients with high and "gray zone" risk reccurrence early breast cancer

intervention.arm_group_label: Patients with high and "gray zone" risk reccurrence early breast cancer

study_pop.textblock: Patients with high and "gray zone" risk reccurrence breast cancer, gastointestinal cancers and gynecological malignancies who are prescribed myelosuppressive therapy with empegfilgrastim supportive therapy to support planned RDI, reduce the frequency, duration of neutropenia, the incidence of febrile neutropenia (FN) and infections manifested by FN, as part of routine clinical practice according to the approved indications of the appropriate drugs.
